InfoScreen.Name: sidewalk_features_info
InfoScreen.Text: Sidewalk features questionnaire Perception of the side walk

Label.Text: Good (NO holes, sizable cracks, or crumbling or uneven pavement on both sides of the street)
Fair (Holes, sizable cracks, or crumbling or uneven pavement along SOME of the side walk on both sides of the street)
Poor (Holes, sizable cracks, or crumbling or uneven pavement along MOST or ALL of the sidewalk on both sides of the street)

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sso_8
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Are there trees present in the neighborhood between the sidewalk and the street?

Label.Text: On 75% or more of the neighborhood

ChoiceQuestion.Name: sso_9
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Are there dropped curbs in this neighborhood between the sidewalk and the street? (Dropped curbs allow vehicles to cross the pavement from the road to a driveway)
